This pages maps the main soccer stadiums in England. Click on a marker to see the name and capacity.

```{r}
library(leaflet)
df <- read.csv('grounds.csv')

df %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions(), popup=paste(df$popup, ' (', df$capacity, ')'))

```
